website_summaries.verdict: Affordable, sturdy disc-shaped cones that were designed with the soccer player in mind.
pros: Set of 50 field cones in five colors
Made of soft, flexible plastic that bends easily
Heavy enough that they won't blow away in the wind
Unique shaped hole on top can hold a soccer ball
cons: A few users have said that their carrying strap broke after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: Cool Cones
customer_reviews.text: These are great cones - 50-pack in a variety of colors for lots of uses. However, they don't look like the picture shown. They have a funky shaped hole in the middle, perfect for grabbing, and they seem a little thicker than the ones in the photo. I have no complaints about the appearance. I actually like that they are a little different than the standard ones - everyone knows they are mine, so none of the other coaches can steal them. Comes with a cool mesh bag, which I use to put pinnies in instead. (I recommend using a strap to collect the cones.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch?
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product based on other reviews and the seller's photos. They were more expensive than other options on Amazon, but they looked thicker, heavier, and more robust so I spent a little extra money for those qualities. However, I did not receive cones that look like the images. We received 50 cones (5 colors, 10 cones each), but they are paper thin (you can see through them in the attached pictures) and poorly made. I am unimpressed by the low quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: JK24

customer_reviews.title: Can’t hold a ball on top anymore - bummed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a couple of years ago. Loved them. Used them over and over again for my soccer teams... then I forgot them at a practice field. They were gone by the next day when I went back. So I bought a new set. These are crap. They are super flimsy. They can’t hold a ball on top. They just collapse. I tried doubling the cones up to support a ball. They still collapsed. Kevenz, let me know when you fix this issue. I want cones like the ones I bought before.
customer_reviews.author: M. Learned

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturers must have Changed
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set from the same company. You would assume the quality would be the same, NOT! I love the first set, this second set, one step one with a soccer/football shoe, punctured, easy to rip, and the wind blows the cone away after your drill is set up. Change back to the old manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: LAMONT H. THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cones for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these cones! I use them almost every day in my PE class. Things I love about them, super flexible so if little feet step on them they don't crack they just fold and then pop right back to shape. It was hard to balance a basketball on top of it but I flipped the cone upside down like a bowl and it held the ball in place fantastically! The only thing I wish is that it had purple included in the color as most PE equipment come in a rainbow color set and I love to color code my lessons for easy student management. Aside from that great cones!
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2

customer_reviews.title: Best Soccer Cones Ever
customer_reviews.text: These are great for soccer practices. Bought a couple hundred of these for all our teams and they work perfectly for drills even in high grass. You can beat these to death with cleats (from 4 year olds to 17 year olds) without any wear and tear. Great product. I'd buy more, but they last forever so I don't have to!
customer_reviews.author: Incognito

customer_reviews.title: What ships does not match the quality in the picture nor description
customer_reviews.text: I read through the comments indicating that there had been a decrease in quality, but I figured it was still worth a shot. What I received was not what was pictured in the listing. The cones did _not_ have the "KEVENZ" name/logo stamped on them, they were not as thick as the pictures indicated that they'd be (1mm), nor were they as durable/flexible. I ended up returning them, because they just appeared to be overpriced versions of the same cheap cones that other listings were selling for less.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and bendable, but not flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I heard some poor reviews about these cones, such as poor durability and easily blown in the wind. I used them for coaching and for my own trajning and never had a problem with either. They are very durable and can withstand a beating. I was training on grass mostly, with the occasional artificial grass. I would assume that if it was extreme wind conditions on turf, the cones might blow away. However, in normal conditions i don't think this would happen that often.
customer_reviews.author: BenC

customer_reviews.title: New product is a lot Thinner than previous versions.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these a year ago or so and really enjoyed the product a lot. I just recently ordered a new set and they are a lot thinner than the previous thicker version, a bit of a disappointment !
customer_reviews.author: Crdiaz

customer_reviews.title: Good value - multiple colors is handy, though stacking at the end of practice is a little annoying
customer_reviews.text: These are a really good value. They come with 10 of each color, and having the different colors is helpful. You can set up grids and tell some kids to go to the red grid, the yellow grid, etc. It just makes things a little more clear. The only con is that these cones are not easy to stack up at the end of practice. With other cones, you stack them and they stay in place. These are convex more than conical, so a cone can slide around on top of the cones underneath. When you're collecting and stacking more than a few, they tend to slide apart awkwardly.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some soccer cones to use at home for training with my children. These were a great price and looked like they would do the job. I was very happy to find that they exceeded my expectations in every way. They are made from a sturd heavy plastic and not flimsy like some other brands I've used. They are nice and big which makes them very visible out on a soccer field. I received 10 in each of the 5 colors (blue, green, red, orange and yellow) for 50 cones total. The carrying case is wonderful and allows me to keep it all together. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy and they have exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy and they have exceeded my expectations. They are sturdy discs and they do a great job marking the field. I have not used them yet in very windy conditions, but suspect the vent holes are going to prevent them blowing around. The cut-out at the top, rather than just a small hole makes it very easy to hold a number of cones easily - nice feature. They are new to me, but they are very well colored and seem to be a bit thicker plastic than the majority of my older style discs. Would buy again without hesitation. Even had another coach come over and check them out and he liked them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Labrax

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These cones are great! My daughter loves when we put them out and use them as a goal or have her do some soccer drills or even obstacles courses for her. I love how they go right on the strap so you don’t lose any of them. It also make it easy for picking up and it allows the children to be apart of the clean up as well! Plus the price wasn’t to bad either
customer_reviews.author: Stephie AC

customer_reviews.title: Durable enough to handle toddlers who think that they should be jumping "on" them!
customer_reviews.text: These were such a great purchase, I highly recommend! I use these at least monthly to host a field day for kids ranging from early walkers to early grade school. Some of the kids don't bet the purpose, but see them as something to jump on, but it's okay because they are so incredibly durable! Once smushed, they either pop back out themselves, or you can pop them back out. The bright colors are easily seen and these come with a strap that holds them together for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: So far so good I ordered 3 sets of these for our coaches ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good I ordered 3 sets of these for our coaches they are bigger than most cones which I actually like for practice. They are normal quality they aren't no Kwik Goal cones BUT! kwik goal cones are pricey and how often do we lose cones on the practice field? I have kwik goal cones personally large ones the 6" ones and very small ones I use for game warm ups (easy to carry). But I'm thinking of buying another set of these for myself for practice.
customer_reviews.author: ikonkar

customer_reviews.title: Great for motorcycle maneuverability practice
customer_reviews.text: Great for practicing maneuverability on our new Vespa-style scooters. Popped back up easily if run over. Used a Harbor Freight 36 In. Pickup And Reach Tool that i pushed through the disc cone opening, then tilted up in the air to collect them without having to squat down to pick them up.
customer_reviews.author: istadevata

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize these came on a carrier rope like thing. It makes it a lot easier to carry them. These are durable and the bright colors make it much easier to see them. There are so many drills that you can do with cones and a variety of colors help separate the different drills. This is a really inexpensive way to get lots of drills into your practice. I really like these.
customer_reviews.author: They call me Mom

customer_reviews.title: motorcycle cones
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these as cones to set out patterns in cones competitions on motorcycles instead of traffic cones. A lot less money, and just as effective for their intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More useful than I imagined
customer_reviews.text: We've used a mono-color cone set in the past. It's surprising how often we find a use for distinguishing colors now that we have them. The design of these cones makes a great combination of visibility and resistance to movement. We've also been fitting little dixie cups into the cutout which allow us to insert little vertical flags (light up for night markers)
customer_reviews.author: docpkrdude

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for soccer practice.
customer_reviews.text: Great cones. Very soft and pliable, will work perfect for my soccer team. About 25% of the cost of a big box store, and seems higher quality. As you can see in the photo, I received 5 colors as advertised and mine came with a carry strap. Love that they are unique from other cones, so other coaches are less likely to steal them. Larger hole in the middle makes them easy to grab. I will post an update if I am 100% less than satisfied as the season goes on. Update - two years later these are still going strong after weekly use.
customer_reviews.author: ccs michigan

customer_reviews.title: Great for impromptu neighborhood games!
customer_reviews.text: Neighborhood boys can now make their own football field in our backyard! :-) These cones were a fun treat to give my boys and their friends, who are so into football and soccer right now. They don't blow away either--the hole in the middle helps with that. My only complaint is when they are left all over my basement family room...but that's not the fault of the product!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany from South Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Helpful at practice
customer_reviews.text: I like the multiple colors because I can organize drills and activities by color and cut down on confusion. They were a little wider than I was looking for, but they work well. Fifty of them came in the pack which is plenty and the strap makes it easy to keep them together and carry them.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Murphy

customer_reviews.title: All orange, no strap!
customer_reviews.text: All orange without a carrying strap. I bought these so I could tell the kids to run to the blue then yellow. I can't do this when they are the same color. Not having a strap makes it more difficult to keep track of them all.
customer_reviews.author: onlyme

customer_reviews.title: High quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of these prior to the HS season starting up, and used them throughout the spring season. I reserved the green for the Varsity squad, but unfortunately they were "lifted" after practice mid season. I ordered a second pack that will allow us to expand upon our drills, and also provide us with another 10 green (the guys came to love the exclusivity of having the green pennies and cones for Varsity use only). High quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, useful and budget friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how many cones came with this order! The different colors make it easy and fun for the kids when setting them up for soccer. Although, the cones themselves are pretty flimsy, this was definitely one of the better deals I found when searching for a larger quantity of cones.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M

customer_reviews.title: They hold up to little kids.  What more do you want?
customer_reviews.text: These have been indispensable for coaching. There are enough for a full soccer field, and for breakout sessions. The different colors have really come in handy. I expect these to last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Kahomada

customer_reviews.title: Good Size Cone - Soccer
customer_reviews.text: Get a lot of cones for the price. These are great in grass and have held up especially my players tend to trample on them during a hard practice. They tend to pop back in place and have held up after being used in many practices. The only thing that I wished for was a quick strap. Otherwise, nice product and good pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Parker

customer_reviews.title: Withstood a season of U8 soccer with no problems.
customer_reviews.text: Withstood a season of U8 soccer with no problems. The carrying strap is a great feature - helps with carrying the cones, fixing them on the outside of a bag, or organizing them within a bag. I didn't know I would need so many cones until I had them at my disposal.
customer_reviews.author: SamTop Contributor: Baseball

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm coaching U6 soccer, and the kids love to step on these. So far they have all survived and popped back into shape. The belt that holds them together is nice. I can easily explain different meanings for different colors when setting up new drills. The kids find it easier to put their ball on top of the dome than the cone shape. Would order again if I needed more, but these are so nice I doubt that will be anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: ... these as arena markers for horse training and we love them! They are very visible from horseback and ...
customer_reviews.text: we use these as arena markers for horse training and we love them! They are very visible from horseback and the multi-colors make it easy to direct students on a pattern. they are not quite flat and they are very flexible, but the opening is small enough that they are safe for the horses to step on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are serious about coaching kids and need discs - buy these
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I expected. The discs come with a nylon carry bag that is functional but not great. Be careful when ordering, there are a lot of options to pick from with regards to colors and design. Having consistent colors, and multiple colors has helped outline drills for my young soccer players. Having multiple colors has allowed for "more complex" drills to be set up and executed by the players much quicker than when I had a random assortment of cones, discs and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Value!
customer_reviews.text: These things get the job done for soccer practice. Durable, colorful and a great price! Highly recommend considering this for future teams.
customer_reviews.author: Scott O.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Motorcycle training
customer_reviews.text: I use these for motorcycle training. They are high visbility and also low profile, sothe wind does not blow them around and when i run over them they dont move.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: .6 not the advertised 1 mm thickness.
customer_reviews.text: .6 not the advertised 1 mm thickness. The only measurement the got correct is the height at 2 inches. The width is 7.75 inches.
customer_reviews.author: huntingstill

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted these to help with his foot work for sports. They are an excellent value for the money. Convenient to take wherever you go. Quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: AuNaturel1

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors, thin/lightweight plastic
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and lightweight plastic. I am worried about them flying away on a slight windy day. It comes with a strap to keep them together. Very happy to see the strap in the box.
customer_reviews.author: UmbreDeLaLuna

customer_reviews.title: Quality is lacking
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended. The quality of this item is pretty poor. They’re not nearly as thick as the picture suggests. They are flimsy and tend to blow around in the wind. I returned this item earlier today. On the pro side, you get a lot of markers for the money and having different colors is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: These are a bit short to see if the grass ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit short to see if the grass is long, I would choose taller cones next time. The cones didn't come with a strap to put them over the shoulder after looping through the cones' center hole as I thought they would--they came in a net bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for training groups
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my boot camp classes, and they were perfect for this. Good quality, like the colors, and the carrying strap is good. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use these to set up my motorcycle course. I like to practice so when I face stuff on the I'll have that mussel memory. These have been driven over and they hold up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Light and durable. All I need.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. They don't break easily and are very flexible. Work great if the grass is not high.
customer_reviews.author: JJRGCLPA

customer_reviews.title: Very Versatile
customer_reviews.text: great tool for my young entrepreneur program and the young people who own their own businesses.
customer_reviews.author: Bstrong

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, with bright colors - material is very light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Bright colors, flexible material. I was hoping they'd be a bit heavier to avoid blowing away quite as easily (it is *always* windy where we practice). I had my U13 player stomp on one a few times - it popped right back into shape without a problem...big improvement over other disc cones that crack after being stepped on.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my team
customer_reviews.text: These cones are great for my field hockey team. I purchased these because our cones were going missing. These cones are unique in their design, so no one accidentally takes them. The strap they come with is a great way to make sure they always stay together.
customer_reviews.author: EmmJayy23

customer_reviews.title: Better than description
customer_reviews.text: These were quite the pleasant surprise! They are nice and large size and very flexible. The quality is better than I thought they’d be. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Samuels

customer_reviews.title: a lot of quantity but lacking quality
customer_reviews.text: i use these with my kids for some outdoor training sessions. they are very lightweight but not that durable. good thing its a pack of 50.
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: My grandson's love the rings/hoops
customer_reviews.text: My grandson's love the rings/hoops.! I gave them the hurdles as well as other agility course items for their birthday. They are very good at soccer,basketball and baseball. These seemed right up their alley!
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: tremendous value, great for all sporting needs
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to get some 'cones' or 'discs' to use for my kids when we go to the park. Making obstacle courses or boundaries for sports like soccer as well. This was a tremendous value, very affordable for 50 discs, far more than we need, and in a variety of colors too.
customer_reviews.author: d808Top Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for standard sizes disc cones in a variety of colors for a good price then buy these. BUT the description is for a 6” diameter cone—these measure 7.825” (7 7/8”) I need a smaller cone for a specific training purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Atkins

customer_reviews.title: 5 🌟!
customer_reviews.text: My husband plays soccer and is a soccer coach. He really liked that these cones weren't easily broken or blown by the wind. The bright colors and unique design are cool also!
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Exactly as Expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as needed. No cones have cracked or broken during the soccer season. I do wish some of the colors were brighter. For evening practices, the blue and green cones don't really stand out on the grassy fields.
customer_reviews.author: B. J.

customer_reviews.title: Cones were meant to be beat on and these can take it.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size of these cones. They could be seen from far away and the variety of colors meant I could use them to set up different drills and categorize them by color. They were run over, stepped on, kicked, thrown and just came back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Haines

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Product!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT "cones" for the price! It seems so many companies are charging exorbitant amounts for plastic cones/discs that are cheaply made. I use these for soccer practices and I would definitely buy them again. I may in fact buy more so that I can have 20 of each color. If you're looking for a product like this, look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Seth J

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Product holding up excellent to 7 day a week of multiple teams practicing!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Greenawalt

customer_reviews.title: but they’ve been great. The multiple colors and star in the middle ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t think at first I could find a use for 50 of these, but they’ve been great. The multiple colors and star in the middle so they can be stepped on make them useful for replacing lines in a temp field.
customer_reviews.author: Aladdin

customer_reviews.title: Good PE purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Light and adaptable. You can use for several PE games, exercises, and activities. Relays, agility, game boundaries, etc. Easy to carry. My students love the strap and enjoy being the leader who picks the cones up and buckles the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: I expected these to be much smaller than they were. The description claims a 6" outer diameter but these were closer to 8"... Nearly double the expected area.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good soccer cones
customer_reviews.text: These are decent soccer cones. We use them for soccer and obstacles for the kids bikes and scooters. The kids love to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry and store away
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, bright colors so easy to find in the grass. Perfect for training for any sport.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to see in the field
customer_reviews.text: Got these for soccer practices. They are easy to see in the field. And they are durable. I coach 1st and 2nd graders. They step on these ALOT not one has cracked all season. Love that they all fit on the strap for easy carry and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R. House

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Day one had athletes doing a fast paced drill and several got stepped on and they were okay. Like the strap to keep them contained. Convenient, great quality and quantity for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: No good. Poor Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Super poor & thin quality plastic. No good. I purchased this same products about 2-3 years back and they were wonderful, but now this is not the same quality in anyway. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Wipoj Huse

customer_reviews.title: Great cones. A little flimsy but they get the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cones. A little flimsy but they get the job done perfectly. I have used them on cement court with soccer balls. They have lasted very well for the past month.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pickleball Drills!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for pickleball drills. If you happen to step on them, they are flexible enough that they do not break.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do the job.
customer_reviews.text: These work well. I'd recommend them. The only downside is the quality control of the colors. What's pictured as orange on amazon is isn't very intense in color. Kind of translucent and brownish. The blue one's aren't very nearly as visible on pavement or dark grass.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Fitzroy

customer_reviews.title: Balls roll off, but sturdy and colorful
customer_reviews.text: Balls easily roll off these discs. Colorful and affordable kids use them more as stacking toys rather than ball holders.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little lighter material than expected. They work and help with soccer practice.
customer_reviews.author: I smell of elderberry

customer_reviews.title: Sweet. I like em.
customer_reviews.text: I use these things all the time. Mainly for football but I'll use them for soccer sometimes. I've stepped on them on accident with my cleats and nothing happened. They've held up very well and I really like them and they're definitely good quality.
customer_reviews.author: EndermansGaming

customer_reviews.title: Was this a Kevenz product????
customer_reviews.text: I bought a qty of 2 (50-Pack) one was great quality...had the KEVENZ stamped into disc. The other set of 50 was thinner, no stamp, color difference... guess the purpose of the discs met the intent... Would have been nice to have the same product delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are durable and lightweight but not too flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of cones for the money. They are durable and lightweight but not too flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: W33P

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Practice Discs.
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what we needed for our lacrosse practices. The various colors help us to set up multiple drills at one time and the quality of the cone can withstand a direct hit from cleats.
customer_reviews.author: VT Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Great cones, would prefer the carrying strap over a bag.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 100 of these a few months ago (I'm a personal trainer and boot camp instructor) and really liked them. I actually was referred to these by a colleague. I just bought 100 more and was disappointed they didn't come with the strap, but in a bag. I'm being nit picky, but the strap is WAY better than the bag they come in. The bag is great if you ordered 50, but when you have 100 (or 200 in my case) the strap is MUCH more effective.
customer_reviews.author: DNITZ

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Easy to Collect
customer_reviews.text: Great price for 50 markers. Used in dog training. Bold enough to draw the handlers eye but not enough to entice the pups to play with them. Flexible if stepped on, seem durable. The hole in the middle looks a little like a bone! Easy to pick up and collect, also easy for my dog to retrieve using the hole in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Disc Cones
customer_reviews.text: Bright, colorful, and sturdy. I'm an athletic director and they work great for any sport we use them for. Indoors and out. Soccer, Flag Football, relay races and for agility training. I'm glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great for putting up a play area boundary
customer_reviews.text: We are using these as boundary markers for play areas. Cost per unit is low. Easily seen. Fun colors/shape/pattern. Don't seem to be a trip hazard. Fairly durable. Pack in a tiny space when not in use. Can be seen from a car (at very low speed) easily even though they are short.
customer_reviews.author: Roc

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I started to coach U8 boy’s team and they are rough on these. For some reason (kids being kids I guess) they love to stand on these. One used two as knee sleds and had someone push him around. No damage. Also love the fact that it came with an adjustable carry belt (though I wish it was little shorter in length, in any case, it was included at no cost so I shouldn’t complain).
customer_reviews.author: Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Used these as gifts in the end of the year soccer bags and they are great. Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Benson

customer_reviews.title: These are great much better than the normal cones
customer_reviews.text: These are great much better than the normal cones. They have a little more weight to them and the design in the middle helps you not cut a finger picking them up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product is great. I just did not receive the carrying strap ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. I just did not receive the carrying strap with it, which makes transportation of the cones difficult
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little cones
customer_reviews.text: Great little cones. The plastic isn’t as thick as I was expecting but not a bad thing. I am using them for practicing moto-gymkhana.
customer_reviews.author: Jace Schindler

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I use them outdoors for a Camp Gladiator boot camp and they work wonderful! Low to the ground so they don't blow away with the wind. I appreciate how there are multiple colors to choose from and use. I love that they come with a strap to keep them all together. Easy to transport. I would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bittinger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome field markers!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect plastic discs for anything you need on the field! I coach kids soccer and these are perfect markers and super durable if they get stepped on.
customer_reviews.author: SoSoCal

customer_reviews.title: Nice plastic, work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: They work as advertised. The cones seem to sit a little higher off the ground than the legacy (orange drill) cones. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CadillacChaos

customer_reviews.title: The discs arrived on time and in excellent condition. These were exactly what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: The discs arrived on time and in excellent condition. These were exactly what I was expecting. If you are looking for hard plastic discs, keep looking. But these have worked really well for the 2 soccer teams my husband and I are coaching. They seem to be pretty durable as well. The flexible plastic allows them to be stepped on and not break. Which is good with 10 year old's. They come in a mesh bag to keep them all together.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this for the price. Bought them with ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this for the price. Bought them with some other items to do drills at home with my son who started youth football last year.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I like that they can can be secured on the strap.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves the colors and helps her train for soccer in the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Juan M

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Straps that hold these cones together are great feature for me. Easy to carry them and less mess.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems good. Great colors
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems good. Great colors. My kid aren't into it but it's not the maker's fault so I'm still giving it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Epipark

customer_reviews.title: These were very affordable, haven't broken, and don't ...
customer_reviews.text: These were very affordable, haven't broken, and don't blow away in moderate winds. I use them every practice during soccer season.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great for FPV markers
customer_reviews.text: Got these for FPV racing and they are perfect for the task. Light weight and durable, bright colors that are easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: T2i Owner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing training cones
customer_reviews.text: Durable training cones that hold their place and shape in all conditions, save direct hits from either feet or balls
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Let the soccer drills begin
customer_reviews.text: Great product, please note a strap is included. Sturdy product, takes a punishment and keeps shape. Enjoy the different colors for various drills.
customer_reviews.author: M Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Flexible and durable. These cones will do the job for your fitness and sports drills. If you crack one you have plenty more to replace it. Very visible in grass.
customer_reviews.author: BIG WILL

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: These are worth every penny. Happy with purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F

customer_reviews.title: Product is not as described
customer_reviews.text: The product description is inaccurate. These are described as having a diameter of 6 inches when in reality the diameter is 8 inches.
customer_reviews.author: NV Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Teach Flag Football routes!
customer_reviews.text: Very brightly colored. Excellent for teaching football routes! They're just the right height to be seen even in tall grass, but short enough not to yep trip on our break when they're stepped on.
customer_reviews.author: Daviddcb

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great comes, feel very solid. the carry strap is very convenient. vibrant colors are easy to distinguish.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Strap breaks quickly
customer_reviews.text: As a coach these are a must. Unfortunately my strap came apart so I now have cones scattered in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and extremely durable
customer_reviews.text: It's carrying strap has been very useful as my elementary students assist in carrying and using the discs. They have withstood many elementary students walking on them and kicking them.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Ward

product_meta.title: KEVENZ 50-Pack Soccer disc Cones,More Thicker, More Flexible,Multi Color Cone for Agility Training, Soccer, Football, Kids, Field Marker
feature_bullets: Set of 50 Field cone Markers,with a carrying strap
Good Build: Made of soft plastic that is thicker, more flexible and longer-lasting.
Measures: 2.2" high, and has a diameter of 6"
Durable and Flexible: longer-lasting cones will bounce back after getting stepped on, kicked, and run over season after season.
